lexUnit.name: spread.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: distribute a mass or a number of individuals over a surface

sentence.text: The waiter spread a napkin across Flora 's knees , presented the menu .
He opened the folder and spread its contents across the table .

Hoffmann spread the photographs on a table .
